name: VacationBigIsland
tag_list: luxury, hawaiian-islands, oceanfront, estates, hawaii, travel
overview: VacationBigIsland.com offers vacation rentals on the Big Island of Hawaii. They have homes and condos for rental from Kona to Hawi along the Kohala Coast. Many of the homes are situated on the same shoreline as several luxury resort hotels including the Four Seasons at Hualalai, Mauna Kea Beach Hotel, Mauna Lani Bay Hotel & Bungalows, the Orchid at Mauna Lani, Hilton Waikoloa Village and Outrigger Waikoloa. These resorts mean there is world-class golf and tennis along with excellent shopping, dining and recreational facilities. All rentals require a 5 to 7 night minimum stay with special restrictions and rates for holiday rentals.
